item.title: Report E-2023030299
item.description:
Report E-2023030299

Identified by scraper @ 2023-04-03T13:57:55+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-02-23
  • City: PRESCOTT
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: XPO Logistics terminal LGT experienced a release from a 1-gallon metal jerrycan during transit. The release occurred on 1-30 westbound at mile marker 46 due to a pallet nail puncture. ERTS dispatched contractors to conduct cleanup operations. Contractors arrived onsite and confirmed approximately 1-gallon of product released from one 1-gallon metal jerrycan due to a nail puncture. The material was evaporating quickly. The damaged can and impacted cardboard were collected into a 5-gallon poly pail. The waste was transported to the XPO terminal located in Garland, TX for terminal personnel to manage.

item.title: Report X-2023020942
item.description:
Report X-2023020942

Identified by scraper @ 2023-04-03T13:57:55+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-02-16
  • City: HOT SPRINGS NATIONAL PARK
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package arrived with damage to the box due to leak during transit. DescribePack: Two sides of the box were dissolved/saturated due to the nature of the hazmat liquid DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: None needed. Package(box) soaked up spilled liquid.

item.title: Report X-2023020922
item.description:
Report X-2023020922

Identified by scraper @ 2023-04-03T13:57:55+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-02-16
  • City: HOT SPRINGS NATIONAL PARK
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Loaders found this hazmat pkg laying on it's side in the trailer. The caps on two of the pkgs were not secure, contents sloshed out. The handle on one of the bottles punched through the wet box. The leak was soaked up by the inner box and outer box. DescribePack: Loose caps they have the safety caps, neither of the caps on the two that leaked were secure we tightened them. There was minimal amount released. DurationRel: 3 and MitigateEffect: we used the magabsorb to soak up the liquid on the outside of the bottles.
